data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Average performers stop when they feel fear. Iconic producers accelerate once they get frightened.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: The best leaders are the most dedicated learners. Read great books daily.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Are your fears standing in the way of your biggest life?

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Your current conditions are echoes of your past.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: The way we do small things determines the way we do everything.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: All it takes is one new insight or idea, strongly acted on, to take you to a completely different place.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Feeling lost? Good! Now you get to walk to new paths that lead to much better places.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Small daily improvements lead to stunning results.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Become one of the rare people who don’t know how to quit.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: The fears we don’t face become our limits.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Your daily behavior reveals your deepest beliefs.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: The beautiful thing about fear is, when you run to it, it runs away.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: The beautiful thing about today is that you get the choice to make it better than yesterday.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Lead without a title.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Just about every massively creative person was considered an oddball by everyone around them.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Picasso didn’t wait until he was Picasso to perform like Picasso.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Your life is too important to give it to distractions.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: To double your income and success, triple your investment in personal development and professional mastery.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: When you see yourself as a powerful creator of your conditions, you will see opportunities to get to your goals, and dreams, all around you.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: How can you cross new bridges if you’re not willing to burn old ones?
